DOC.brief_summary: Intravenous phenobarbital in combination with a symptom-guided standardized lorazepam-based alcohol withdrawal protocol will be associated with decreased need for ICU admission, continuous lorazepam infusion and will not be associated with increased adverse events.
DOC.criteria: Need for admission to hospital for acute alcohol withdrawal allergy to phenobarbital, lorazepam, age<18 or >65
